dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7034 IH: To rename the portions of the Gateway National Seashore located on Staten Island, New York, as the “Senator James L. Buckley National Seashore”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Malliotakis introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To rename the portions of the Gateway National Seashore located on Staten Island, New York, as the Senator James L. Buckley National Seashore.

section.header: Renaming portions of the Gateway National Seashore

subsection.text: The portions of the Gateway National Seashore located on Staten Island, New York shall be known as the Senator James L. Buckley National Seashore.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the portions of the Gateway National Seashore located on Staten Island, New York, is deemed to be a reference to the Senator James L. Buckley National Seashore.
